name: Detonating Siphon
description: Violently drain the last spark of life from a corpse, dealing 4248 Disease Damage over 12 seconds to all enemies around the corpse and between you and the corpse.    When the siphon ends it causes the corpse to explode, dealing an additional 1799 Disease Damage to all enemies around the corpse.  While slotted, your damage done is increased by 3%.
effectLines: Ability now deals Disease Damage. The corpse explodes at the end of the siphon, dealing additional damage.
coefDescription: Violently drain the last spark of life from a corpse, dealing $1 Disease Damage over 12 seconds to all enemies around the corpse and between you and the corpse.    When the siphon ends it causes the corpse to explode, dealing an additional $2 Disease Damage to all enemies around the corpse.  While slotted, your damage done is increased by 3%.
